about_the_game:
Carry Forward Human Civilization in a Thriving Ocean World

In a future where Earth's magnetic field is in crisis, humanity sends out "Pioneers" to find a new home. As one of these explorers, you'll arrive on an ocean planet 15 light years away and embark on an unknown adventure. In this ocean-covered corner of the universe, you are humanity's last hope to build a new home and continue the legacy of Earth's civilization.

Rebuild Industrial Order in the Dark Depths

While exploring the ocean planet, you'll need to survive and establish a complete industrial system. Automate construction and manage intelligent resource gathering and production. Use dozens of futuristic machines, factories, and transport systems to build a complex and efficient industrial network, laying the foundation for the revival of human civilization.

Explore Countless Mysteries on a Blue Alien Planet

This ocean-covered planet is full of mysteries. Each exploration brings new discoveries and challenges with randomly generated environments, rich story missions, alternating day and night, and complex weather. From faster-than-light travel to wormhole technology, building interstellar portals, and encountering unique underwater creatures, all secrets await you in the game.
